title: Taking your K8s app to the Cloud!
description:
This workshop was recorded live. Some live elements have been cut out for your enjoyment. Be sure to make use of the timestamps below. Enjoy!

0:00 Introduction 
11:34 Cloud Computing Overview
14:54 Cloud Computing Principles
20:32 Cloud Deployment Models
29:48 Cloud Providers and Services
45:20 Deploying Cassandra on GCP
49:27 Serverless Computing
53:49 Live Coding - Deploying an App in Google Kubernetes Engine
1:48:47 Wrap up
